name: Dharun

services.title: Server Side Developer
services.description: I am an experienced server-side developer with a strong background in designing and implementing robust backend solutions.I thrive on optimizing performance, security, and reliability, and I am passionate about staying current with emerging technologies in server-side development to deliver innovative solutions

services.title: Dev-Ops Engineer
services.description: I excel in creating highly available and scalable infrastructures while maintaining a strong focus on security and compliance. My passion for staying up-to-date with the latest DevOps trends and best practices enables me to drive efficiency and innovation within development teams.

services.title: Database Engineer
services.description: And Experienced and dedicated database management professional with a strong track record of designing, implementing, and maintaining robust database systems. Proficient in various database technologies and skilled in optimizing database performance, ensuring data integrity, and supporting business-critical applications.

aboutpara: I am a software engineer with a passion for coding and I specialize in software development and deployments with AWS services,I enjoy creating efficient and effective solutions to technical challenges and thrive in collaborative team environments. I am dedicated to continuous learning and staying current with industry trends to enhance my skills and contribute to innovative projects
